pullRequest.title: CATROID-237 "If on edge bounce" bounce outside of loops
pullRequest.bodyText:
If an object was placed partly outside the screen it did not bounce back with an "if on edge bounce" brick. It only worked if the brick was in e.g. a forever loop.

object now bounces back without loop
added catrobat test

JIRA: https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-237
